WorkItem.Description:
I've configured TypeScript to compile all of the output into a single file. I'm using the Project properties in Visual Studio under `TypeScript` called `Combine JavaScript output into file`.

The issue is; when the `.ts` file is re-compiled, the minified JS doesn't get updated.
